p: All three entomological indices demonstrated similar correlations with minimum and maximum RH. Negative correlations were observed between previous month and two months previous minimum and maximum RH with all three entomological indices of Ae. albopictus in all study and control areas. These correlations were significant in 3 rd Kurana study area for CI of Ae. albopictus and Eriyawetiya, Akbar Town and 3 rd Kurana study areas for HI and BI of Ae. aegypti. Similar non-significant negative correlations were observed between one and two months previous minimum RH with HI and BI of Ae. aegypti.
